Message:
Not a single shot
I fired hit its mark.

Despite all my training,
day in and day out,
I see no improvement.

Why? It’s enough to make
anyone begin to doubt themselves.

Losing out to my own frustration,
I pounded the table in anger.

The sudden commotion shook
a nearby officer abruptly from
his daydream, but I paid no mind.

I hate using firearms.
The world I see as I focus
my eyes over the barrel,
the smell of gunpowder
wafting under my nose—
it all reminds me of that day.
